text:
The excellent instructions you have to build ant are quite useless because the 
build utilities bootstrap.sh and build.sh are not included in the build.

Furthermore, the instructions on how to install from an rpm file are not 
included, so I have no idea how to proceed.

Please correct this in the build, plus email the two scripts I require to get 
going.

Thanks,
Frank
creator: kiwican_dub@yahoo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Could you please tell us, which build you are refering to?

I've just checked all source tarballs and zipfiles for Ant 1.2 and 1.3beta2
and the contain the bootstrap scripts. Would be easier if we knew which build
to fix 8-). Thanks

You have downloaded the binary distribution. It is not intended for build ant 
but for using ant. It includes the source for your reference (and this is no 
longer the case with Ant 1.3). 

If you want to build from source, please download a source distribution.
